name: mummy

effect.sun_moon: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy. multitype is unaffected. If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy. multitype is unaffected. If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy. multitype is unaffected. If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.

short_effect: Changes attacking Pokémon's abilities to Mummy on contact.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Mummy.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Mummy.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Mummy.
